section.title: Binary Packages
section.para: Skit is currently not available as pre-built binaries. It must be built from source code.

section.title: Building From Source
section.para: The skit source code can be downloaded as a tarball from pgfoundry, or can be obtained using git from

section.title: From Pgfoundry
section.para: The tarball is available from pgfoundry by clicking the download link.

Unpack the tarball using tar:
$ tar xvzf skit_version.tgz
